div.div: Predicted habitat suitability relative to altitude for three species of Psilopogon barbet.
div.p: Solid lines represent generalized additive model (GAM) predictions based on survey data; open circles represent the proportion of surveys at a given location in which each species was detected. Notably, Blue-throated and Golden-throated Barbet are similarly sized and segregate altitudinally; Great Barbet, which is much larger, overlaps broadly with both.
